Field Detail

NONE

static final int NONE
The default, standard markup mode without any extensions.

See Also:

QUOTES

static final int QUOTES
Pretty single and double quotes.

Constant Field Values

SMARTYPANTS

static final int SMARTYPANTS
All of the smartypants prettyfications. Equivalent to SMARTS || QUOTES.

See Also:
Smartypants, Constant Field Values

ABBREVIATIONS

static final int ABBREVIATIONS
PHP Markdown Extra style abbreviations.

See Also:
PHP Markdown Extra, Constant Field Values

HARDWRAPS

static final int HARDWRAPS
Enables the parsing of hard wraps as HTML linebreaks. Similar to what github does.

See Also:
Github-flavored-Markdown, Constant Field Values

AUTOLINKS

static final int AUTOLINKS
Enables plain autolinks the way github flavoures markdown implements them. With this extension enabled pegdown will intelligently recognize URLs and email adresses without any further delimiters and mark them as the respective link type.

See Also:
Github-flavored-Markdown, Constant Field Values

TABLES

static final int TABLES
Enables table support similar to what Multimarkdown offers.

See Also:
MultiMarkdown, Constant Field Values

ALL

static final int ALL
All available extensions.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
